member.name: T:InDoOut_Desktop_API.Plugins.IPlugin
member.summary: Represents a plugin that is recognised by the application and loaded in automatically.

member.name: P:InDoOut_Desktop_API.Plugins.IPlugin.Valid
member.summary: Whether the plugin is valid and can be loaded.

member.name: P:InDoOut_Desktop_API.Plugins.IPlugin.Name
member.summary: The name of the plugin. Visible to the user.

member.name: P:InDoOut_Desktop_API.Plugins.IPlugin.SafeName
member.summary: The safe version of . This has exception handling in the case of an invalid name.

member.name: P:InDoOut_Desktop_API.Plugins.IPlugin.Description
member.summary: A description of what this plugin contains or does. Visible to the user.

member.summary: The safe version of . This has exception handling in the case of an invalid description.

member.summary: The author(s) of this plugin. Visible to the user.

member.name: P:InDoOut_Desktop_API.Plugins.IPlugin.SafeAuthor
member.summary: The safe version of . This has exception handling in the case of an invalid author.

member.name: T:InDoOut_Desktop_API.Plugins.Plugin
member.summary: Allows the application to reference the class as a plugin, which enables it to load in the custom functions and other extensions automatically.
